Texts.Eng:
^cyan;New in version 5.6.218^reset;
  
  * hopefully corrects the small Apiary positioning issue. You will likely need to place them again.
  
  * Correction to some Shoggoth sounds referencing invalid sound files
  
  * Skittles got some changes (Kherae)
  
  * Bone extraction loop has been closed
  
  * Meatvine plant recipe should properly craft 3, not 1, seed.
  
  * Fleashreapers got heavily changed and are now original content at long last! Their spawn locations have been adjusted as well. (Ycar)
  
  * adds Redwood Bark tile, drops from Primeval redwoods (Aelfgifu)
  
  * added a ^orange;clear inputs^reset; button to Terminals (Eternalspirit)
  
  * Also moved the Refresh button to the bottom right of the Terminal, and added Clear Inputs to bottom middle (Eternalspirit)
  
  * replaced 289 counts of pot in item categories with decorative, and one count of science! (Kherae)
  
  * Research laptops should now properly flip direction when placed
  
  * removed old patchlog entries from this popup 
  
  * Research voxels properly display in-hand
  
_____________________________________________________
  ^cyan;New in version 5.6.217^reset;
  
  * reverted Research costs on Techs. The UI didn't want to actually detect it. Experiment fail. I'll take another stab at it later with updated code.
  
  * subs should properly submerge
